courses.advice_detail_en: A bit chilly but fine for running. Light layering works well. Light breeze, little impact on running. Dry surface, low risk of slipping. Air quality is poor. If you have respiratory or heart issues, avoid intense outdoor running. Adjust intensity based on how you feel and check your condition more often than usual.
